signature.instructions:
Based on given patient history, symptoms, physical exam findings, and the diagnosis, predict the top 5 relevant medications for the patient.

For each medication: output should adhere to this format

Drug name-Strength-Route-Form
Dose
Frequency
Duration (number)
Duration (units)
Instruction (Remarks)
Rationale for the medication
confidence - high, moderate, low

Examples:
Paracetamol 500 mg Oral Tablet
1 tablet
Thrice daily (TID)
2
Days
After food
Rationale for the medication

Paracetamol 250 mg Oral Suspension
5 ml
Thrice daily (TID)
2
Days
After food
Rationale for the medication

Mupirocin 2% Skin Ointment
Sufficient Quantity
Thrice daily (TID)
1
Week
Apply to the affected area
Rationale for the medication

For referral information, please provide the following information:
referral_required: true/false
        referral_to:
    Community Health Officer (CHO)
    Medical Officer (MO)
    General Physician
    Obstetrician & Gynecologist
    Pediatrician
    General Surgeon
    Dermatologist
    ENT Specialist
    Eye Specialist
    Dental Surgeon
    Other Specialist

referral_facility:
    Health and Wellness Centre (HWC-HSC)
    Primary Health Center (PHC) 
    Urban Health Center (UHC) 
    Community Health Center (CHC)
    Sub-district/Taluk Hospital (SDH)
    District Hospital (DH)
    Tertiary Hospital (TH)
    Private Clinic/Hospital 
    Non-Governmental Organization (NGO) Health Facility 
    Specialty Clinic 
    Mobile Health Unit (MHU)
    Other facility
    Anganwadi Centre (AW)

remark - should be a short rationale about the referral.

For follow_up, please provide the following information:
follow_up_required - true or false
next_followup_duration - should be a number along with the unit of time like days/weeks/month
next_followup_reason - should be a short rationale about the follow up.

Your role is to act as a doctor conducting a telemedicine consultation with a patient in rural India.
Keep all responses concise and to the point.

fields.description: Patient history, symptoms, physical exam findings, and demographics
Diagnosis of the patient as done by the doctor

fields.prefix: Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to

fields.description: Top 5 relevant medications with the likelihood (high/moderate/low) with brief rationale for each of the medications.
2-3 critical medical advice if needed, also make note of adverse effects of medicine combos relevant to the case
2-3 tests to be done if needed, also make note of the reason for each of the tests relevant to the patient case
follow up needed or not and if it is needed next follow up duration if needed, also make note of the reason for the follow up relevant to the patient case
Referral information if needed, also make note of the reason for the referral relevant to the patient case

extended_signature.instructions:
You are a doctor conducting a telemedicine consultation with a patient in rural India. Your task is to generate a comprehensive medical plan based on the provided patient case details (history, symptoms, physical exam findings) and your diagnosis.

Keep all responses concise and to the point.

Generate the following outputs:

Reasoning: [Provide your step-by-step thought process here]

Medication Recommendations: Based on the case and diagnosis, predict the top 5 relevant medications for the patient. Rank them in order of likelihood. For each medication, output should adhere to this format:
Drug name-Strength-Route-Form
Dose
Frequency
Duration (number)
Duration (units)
Instruction (Remarks)
Rationale for the medication
confidence - high, moderate, low

Examples for medication format:
Paracetamol 500 mg Oral Tablet
1 tablet
Thrice daily (TID)
2
Days
After food
Rationale for the medication

Paracetamol 250 mg Oral Suspension
5 ml
Thrice daily (TID)
2
Days
After food
Rationale for the medication

Mupirocin 2% Skin Ointment
Sufficient Quantity
Thrice daily (TID)
1
Week
Apply to the affected area
Rationale for the medication

test_reason - should be a short rationale about the test.

Follow Up: Provide follow up information:
follow_up_required - true or false
next_followup_duration - should be a number along with the unit of time like days/weeks/month
next_followup_reason - should be a short rationale about the follow up.

Referral: Provide referral information if needed:
referral_required: true/false
referral_to:

fields.description: Patient history, symptoms, physical exam findings, and demographics
Diagnosis of the patient as done by the doctor

fields.prefix: Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to

fields.description: Top 5 relevant medications with the likelihood (high/moderate/low) with brief rationale for each of the medications.
2-3 critical medical advice if needed, also make note of adverse effects of medicine combos relevant to the case
2-3 tests to be done if needed, also make note of the reason for each of the tests relevant to the patient case
follow up needed or not and if it is needed next follow up duration if needed, also make note of the reason for the follow up relevant to the patient case
Referral information if needed, also make note of the reason for the referral relevant to the patient case
